languages.text: "Отвечу вам словами моей матери: это невозможно. Видите ли, этот вид вымер несколько столетий назад". {n}Голос Вигдис теплеет на пару градусов.{/n} "Мне очень жаль, Лорд-капитан, никаких клепп".

"I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."
languages.original_text: "Отвечу вам словами моей матери: это невозможно. Видите ли, этот вид вымер несколько столетий назад". {n}Голос Вигдис теплеет на пару градусов.{/n} "Мне очень жаль, Лорд-капитан, никаких клепп".

traits.locale_text: "I'm going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, that species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice becomes a few degrees warmer.{/n} "I'm very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

"I'm going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, that species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice becomes a few degrees warmer.{/n} "I'm very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

"I'm going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice becomes a few degrees warmer.{/n} "I'm very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

"I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

"I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

languages.text: « Pour citer la réponse de ma mère : c'est impossible. Surtout considérant que l'espèce s'est éteinte il y a plusieurs siècles. » {n}Il vous semble déceler une légère pointe d'émotion dans la voix de Vigdis.{/n} « Je suis désolée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais les kleppas n'existent plus. »
languages.original_text: "I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

traits.locale_text: « Pour citer la réponse de ma mère : c'est impossible. Surtout considérant que l'espèce s'est éteinte il y a plusieurs siècles. » {n}Il vous semble déceler une légère pointe d'émotion dans la voix de Vigdis.{/n} « Je suis désolée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais les kleppas n'existent plus. »

languages.text: «Voy a citar la respuesta de mi madre: es imposible. La especie se extinguió hace siglos». {n}La voz de Vigdis adquiere un ligerísimo toque amable.{/n} «Lo siento mucho, Lord Capitán. No hay kleppas que podamos adoptar».
languages.original_text: "I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

traits.locale_text: «Voy a citar la respuesta de mi madre: es imposible. La especie se extinguió hace siglos». {n}La voz de Vigdis adquiere un ligerísimo toque amable.{/n} «Lo siento mucho, Lord Capitán. No hay kleppas que podamos adoptar».

languages.text: “那我就得引用我母亲当时的回答了：这恐怕行不通，毕竟这个物种几百年前就灭绝了。”{n}维格迪斯的声音多了一丝暖意。{/n}“非常抱歉，舰长大人，但克莱珀恐怕是没办法养了。”
languages.original_text: "I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

traits.locale_text: “那我就得引用我母亲当时的回答了：这恐怕行不通，毕竟这个物种几百年前就灭绝了。”{n}维格迪斯的声音多了一丝暖意。{/n}“非常抱歉，舰长大人，但克莱珀恐怕是没办法养了。”

languages.text: 「母の返事をお伝えします。『それは不可能です。あの生き物は、何世紀も前に絶滅したのです』」{n}ヴィグディスの声は徐々に暖かくなった。{/n}「申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン。クレッパは残念ながらいないのです」
languages.original_text: "I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

traits.locale_text: 「母の返事をお伝えします。『それは不可能です。あの生き物は、何世紀も前に絶滅したのです』」{n}ヴィグディスの声は徐々に暖かくなった。{/n}「申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン。クレッパは残念ながらいないのです」

languages.text: "Ich zitiere die Antwort meiner Mutter: Das ist unmöglich. Wisst Ihr, die Spezies ist vor mehreren Jahrhunderten ausgestorben." {n}Vigdis' Stimme wird ein klein wenig wärmer.{/n} "Es tut mir sehr leid, Lord Captain. Ich kann Euch keine Kleppas schenken."
languages.original_text: "I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."

traits.locale_text: "Ich zitiere die Antwort meiner Mutter: Das ist unmöglich. Wisst Ihr, die Spezies ist vor mehreren Jahrhunderten ausgestorben." {n}Vigdis' Stimme wird ein klein wenig wärmer.{/n} "Es tut mir sehr leid, Lord Captain. Ich kann Euch keine Kleppas schenken."

languages.text: "Size annemin cevabından alıntı yapacağım: İmkânsız. Anlayacağınız üzere bu türün soyu asırlar önce tükendi." {n}Vigdis'in sesinde belli belirsiz bir sıcaklık duyuluyor.{/n} "Çok üzgünüm Lord Kaptan. Sahiplenebileceğiniz tek bir kleppa bile kalmadı."
languages.original_text: "I am going to quote my mother's response: that is impossible. You see, the species went extinct several centuries ago." {n}Vigdis's voice grows ever so slightly warmer.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. There aren't any kleppas to be had."
